# Minecraft Commands by Choyu I sometimes mess around with minecraft commands so I thought I would document some of the stuff I make. Previously, I had lost several hundred of these commands when my computer died and I lost all the files on my computer so this time, I'm uploading them to github. Anyways, these commands are designed for the latest snapshot of minecraft (which has all the cool armour trims and stuff) but they shoud work in normal 1.19 or lower versions. These commands are all quite long so they will need to be run in a command block (which you get by typing `/give @s command_block 1` in the chat with cheats enabled). All the items on this page are quite OP compared to vanilla items but actually surprisingly ballanced with eachother. Some npc mobs have been added at the end of the page in case you have no friends to play with (like me). Hopefully, they provide sufficient entertainment for you. # Armour Sets ## Reaper Set: **Reaper Scythe:**
Powerful melee weapon with decent damage and high attack speed.
``` /give @p netherite_hoe{Unbreakable:1,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:12,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_damage",UUID:[I;-123410,191716,153641,-383432]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"aaa","italic":false,"color":"dark_red","obfuscated":true},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false},{"text":"REAPER SCYTHE","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":"aaa"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"The Reaper\'s Scythe is a","italic":false}]','[{"text":"legendary scythe forged","italic":false}]','[{"text":"with the power of the","italic":false}]','[{"text":"underworld, able to cut","italic":false}]','[{"text":"through anything with ease","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:sharpness,lvl:5},{id:smite,lvl:5},{id:sweeping,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}],HideFlags:4} 1 ``` **Reaper Helmet:** (note: all the armour pieces have fire aspect since I forgot to remove it)
Powerful armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p netherite_helmet{Unbreakable:1,Trim:{material: "minecraft:redstone",pattern:"minecraft:tide"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:5,Slot:head,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,213316,153641,-426632]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:12,Slot:head,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,213416,153641,-426832]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:3,Slot:head,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,213516,153641,-427032]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.2,Slot:head,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,213616,153641,-427232]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"aaa","italic":false,"color":"dark_red","obfuscated":true},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false},{"text":"REAPER HELMET","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":"aaa"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Forged in the depth of hell,","italic":false}]','[{"text":"Reaper Armour is immune to","italic":false}]','[{"text":"almost all attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:aqua_affinity,lvl:1},{id:blast_protection,lvl:5},{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:fire_protection,lvl:5},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:5},{id:protection,lvl:5},{id:respiration,lvl:3},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}],HideFlags:4} 1 ``` **Reaper Chestplate:**
Powerful armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p netherite_chestplate{Unbreakable:1,Trim:{material: "minecraft:redstone",pattern:"minecraft:tide"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:5,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,240516,153641,-481032]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:24,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,240616,153641,-481232]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:8,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,240716,153641,-481432]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.4,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,240816,153641,-481632]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"aaa","italic":false,"color":"dark_red","obfuscated":true},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false},{"text":"REAPER CHESTPLATE","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":"aaa"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Forged in the depth of hell,","italic":false}]','[{"text":"Reaper Armour is immune to","italic":false}]','[{"text":"almost all attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:blast_protection,lvl:5},{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:fire_protection,lvl:5},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:5},{id:protection,lvl:5},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}],HideFlags:4} 1 ``` **Reaper Leggings:**
Powerful armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p netherite_leggings{Unbreakable:1,Trim:{material: "minecraft:redstone",pattern:"minecraft:tide"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:5,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,254916,153641,-509832]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:20,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,255016,153641,-510032]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:6,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,255116,153641,-510232]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.4,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,255216,153641,-510432]},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Amount:0.025,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.movement_speed",UUID:[I;-123410,255316,153641,-510632]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"aaa","italic":false,"color":"dark_red","obfuscated":true},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false},{"text":"REAPER Leggings","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":"aaa"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Forged in the depth of hell,","italic":false}]','[{"text":"Reaper Armour is immune to","italic":false}]','[{"text":"almost all attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:blast_protection,lvl:5},{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:fire_protection,lvl:5},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:5},{id:protection,lvl:5},{id:swift_sneak,lvl:5},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}],HideFlags:4} 1 ``` **Reaper Boots:**
Powerful armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p netherite_boots{Unbreakable:1,Trim:{material: "minecraft:redstone",pattern:"minecraft:tide"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:5,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,279916,153641,-559832]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:4,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,280016,153641,-560032]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:3,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,280116,153641,-560232]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.2,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,280216,153641,-560432]},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Amount:0.05,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.movement_speed",UUID:[I;-123410,280316,153641,-560632]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"aaa","italic":false,"color":"dark_red","obfuscated":true},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false},{"text":"REAPER BOOTS","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":"aaa"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Forged in the depth of hell,","italic":false}]','[{"text":"Reaper Armour is immune to","italic":false}]','[{"text":"almost all attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:blast_protection,lvl:5},{id:depth_strider,lvl:3},{id:feather_falling,lvl:5},{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:fire_protection,lvl:5},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:5},{id:protection,lvl:5},{id:soul_speed,lvl:3},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}],HideFlags:4} 1 ``` **Reaper Axe:**
Melee weapon with high damage but very slow attack speed. Best used for oneshotting unsuspecting mobs or players.
``` /give @p netherite_axe{Unbreakable:1,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:20,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_damage",UUID:[I;-123410,322116,153641,-644232]},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_knockback",Amount:2,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_knockback",UUID:[I;-123410,322216,153641,-644432]},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Amount:-0.85,Slot:mainhand,Operation:2,Name:"generic.attack_speed",UUID:[I;-123410,322316,153641,-644632]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"aaa","italic":false,"color":"dark_red","obfuscated":true},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false},{"text":"REAPER AXE","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":"aaa"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Forged in the depth of hell,","italic":false}]','[{"text":"the Reaper Axe can cleave","italic":false}]','[{"text":"through any armour.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:efficiency,lvl:5},{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:fortune,lvl:5},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:sharpness,lvl:5},{id:smite,lvl:5},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}],HideFlags:4} 1 ``` **MAXED Reaper Bow:**
Ranged weapon with very high damage output and decent knockback. Also sets the target on fire for quite a while.
``` /give @p bow{Unbreakable:1,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Amount:0.005,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.movement_speed",UUID:[I;-123410,10249,19302,-20498]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.1,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,10349,19302,-20698]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"aaa","italic":false,"color":"dark_red","obfuscated":true},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false},{"text":"REAPER BOW","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":" ","obfuscated":false,"color":"black"},{"text":"aaa"}]'},Enchantments:[{id:flame,lvl:10},{id:infinity,lvl:1},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:power,lvl:30},{id:punch,lvl:5},{id:sharpness,lvl:5},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}]} 1 ``` ## Angel Set: **Angel Helmet:**
Less overpowered armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p iron_helmet{Trim:{material: "minecraft:gold",pattern:"minecraft:coast"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:3,Slot:head,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,123049,19302,-246098]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:3,Slot:head,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,123149,19302,-246298]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:2,Slot:head,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,123249,19302,-246498]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.1,Slot:head,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,123349,19302,-246698]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Angel Helmet","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Blessed armour capable of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"negating the majority of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"enemy attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:aqua_affinity,lvl:1},{id:blast_protection,lvl:4},{id:fire_protection,lvl:4},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:4},{id:protection,lvl:4},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:5}]} 1 ``` **Angel Chestplate:**
Less overpowered armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p iron_chestplate{Trim:{material: "minecraft:gold",pattern:"minecraft:dune"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:8,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,222349,19302,-444698]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:3,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,222449,19302,-444898]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:8,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,222549,19302,-445098]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.1,Slot:chest,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,222649,19302,-445298]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Angel Chestplate","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Blessed armour capable of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"negating the majority of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"enemy attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:blast_protection,lvl:4},{id:fire_protection,lvl:4},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:4},{id:protection,lvl:4},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:5}]} 1 ``` **Angel Leggings:**
Less overpowered armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p iron_leggings{Trim:{material: "minecraft:gold",pattern:"minecraft:sentry"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:6,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,224749,19302,-449498]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:3,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,224849,19302,-449698]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:4,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,224949,19302,-449898]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.1,Slot:legs,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,225049,19302,-450098]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Angel Leggings","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Blessed armour capable of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"negating the majority of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"enemy attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:blast_protection,lvl:4},{id:fire_protection,lvl:4},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:4},{id:protection,lvl:4},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:5}]} 1 ``` **Angel Boots:**
Less overpowered armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.
``` /give @p iron_boots{Trim:{material: "minecraft:gold",pattern:"minecraft:sentry"},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:3,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,204349,19302,-408698]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:3,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,204449,19302,-408898]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:2,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,204549,19302,-409098]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.1,Slot:feet,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,204649,19302,-409298]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Angel Boots","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Blessed armour capable of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"negating the majority of","italic":false}]','[{"text":"enemy attacks.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:blast_protection,lvl:4},{id:depth_strider,lvl:3},{id:feather_falling,lvl:10},{id:fire_protection,lvl:4},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:projectile_protection,lvl:4},{id:protection,lvl:4},{id:soul_speed,lvl:3},{id:thorns,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:5}]} 1 ``` **Angel Bow:**
Good ranged weapon with good knockback and damage.
``` /give @p bow{AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Amount:0.05,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.movement_speed",UUID:[I;-123410,108149,19302,-216298]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Angel Bow","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Launches bolts of holy fire","italic":false}]','[{"text":"with a great rate of change","italic":false}]','[{"text":"in displacement in the","italic":false}]','[{"text":"direction of motion.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:flame,lvl:1},{id:infinity,lvl:1},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:power,lvl:10},{id:punch,lvl:5},{id:unbreaking,lvl:5}]} 1 ``` **Angel Sword:**
Powerful melee weapon with high damage against undead mobs. It deals mediorce damage against living mobs (but still better than maxed netherite sword)
``` /give @p iron_sword{AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:8,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_damage",UUID:[I;-123410,93549,19302,-187098]},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Amount:1,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_speed",UUID:[I;-123410,93649,19302,-187298]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Angel Blade","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"For cutting down heretics.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:knockback,lvl:2},{id:looting,lvl:3},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:sharpness,lvl:5},{id:smite,lvl:10},{id:sweeping,lvl:3},{id:unbreaking,lvl:3}]} 1 ``` **Angel Totem:**
A totem of undying that gives some miscellaneous buffs as well as working as a totem.
``` /give @p totem_of_undying{AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:10,Slot:offhand,Name:"generic.armor",UUID:[I;-123410,255549,19302,-511098]},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:10,Slot:offhand,Name:"generic.armor_toughness",UUID:[I;-123410,255649,19302,-511298]},{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Amount:4,Slot:offhand,Name:"generic.max_health",UUID:[I;-123410,255749,19302,-511498]},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:0.5,Slot:offhand,Name:"generic.knockback_resistance",UUID:[I;-123410,255849,19302,-511698]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Angelic Idol","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"A relic of the gods,","italic":false}]','[{"text":"granting a boon to","italic":false}]','[{"text":"the wielder.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:infinity,lvl:1},{id:mending,lvl:1}]} 1 ``` **Angel Spear:**
Melee and ranged weapon with decent damage. It deals extra damage against undead mobs.
``` /give @p trident{AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_knockback",Amount:2,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_knockback",UUID:[I;-123410,285049,19302,-570098]},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:10,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_damage",UUID:[I;-123410,285149,19302,-570298]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":"Holy Spear","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Throwable pointy stick.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:channeling,lvl:1},{id:fire_aspect,lvl:2},{id:loyalty,lvl:4},{id:mending,lvl:1},{id:sharpness,lvl:5},{id:smite,lvl:10},{id:unbreaking,lvl:5}]} 1 ``` ## Archangel Set: **Archangel Helmet:**
Powerful armour that gives more defence than netherite and gives more health.

/notes/children.title: children
/notes/children.content:
**Children** Children are cringe. Especially young ones. I hate children.

But, because of the most misfortunate of circumstances, I ended up playing a card game with a 5 year old to entertain them. Naturally, because of my superior age and intellect, I start winning. However, the child gets a brilliant idea. He creates a ‘rule’ that states that I must show all of my cards to him and renders most of my strategy useless. However, the key word is ‘most’. I keep winning anyways. Now, the child gets an even superior idea, the rules evolve, and I have to play the weakest card in my deck every time while he plays his strongest. Now I start losing for a bit before I discretely shuffle my cards and regain my advantage. At this point, the child is visibly annoyed and decides to ‘shuffle’ my deck for me, once again forcing me to play only cards that he can beat, and shuffles his deck to retrieve a stronger card if my card beats his. I accept this great injustice, and soon we are about even again. Now, the child pulls another trick out of his sleeve. He grabs half my deck and bets it with me in a game of paper scissors rock. Of course, I win and I get my deck back, but the child is not so easily dissuaded. We bet a second time, a third and a fourth. I win every time, managing to not lose any of my cards, but not gaining any in the process as the game is fundamentally rigged against me, no matter how lucky I get with my RNG. Eventually the child rages and decided to use ‘double scissors’ which somehow beats my rock, breaking all known laws of paper scissors rock in the process. I retaliate with ‘gun’ but somehow, ‘double scissors’ is superior, even though two pairs of scissors are vastly insufficient to stop a 20g chunk of metal travelling at supersonic speeds. Now, I lose most of my deck, leaving me with 3 measly cards against the rest of the deck. At this point, most children would be satisfied with my inevitable defeat, but this child is different. He was special, and not in a good way. Under the guise of helping me, he forces me to play my two worst cards, which he easily beats with his most overpowered cards that he spent 5 minutes picking out from his deck. Now, he finally stops his meddling and lets the game progress naturally. I somehow start winning for a bit, raising my total card count back to 3 before he ‘shuffles’ his deck again and a flood of handpicked overpowered cards annihilates my futile resistance. And to celebrate his victory, the rules evolve once again, allowing the victim to ‘punch the loser lightly’ but I end up on the receiving end of a barrage of full powered punches from an angry 5 year old. I can’t hit back or he would cry, I can’t block since he would cry, I can’t call for help since nobody would believe me. I can only accept the great injustice that has befallen upon me. And now, locked inside a toilet, I type this out, as the 5 year old celebrates loudly outside.

I really hate children.

/notes/experimental1.title: experimental1
/notes/experimental1.content:
**REDACTED x REDACTED2 lore: Chapter 1**
It was a day bathed in sunshine, so warm that it felt as though the sun itself was beaming down to celebrate their fateful encounter. Within the ancient hallways of the Beasly building, [REDACTED2], a year 11 titan, strode confidently towards his economics classroom, woefully unaware that he had computer science instead. The very mention of [REDACTED2]’s name sent confusion through the student body, as he was sufficiently irrelevant that nobody knew who he was.

And then there was [REDACTED], a year 9 enigma, a shy wisp of stardust that drifted through the sea of adolescent cacophony. Her music, it was said, had the power to soothe even the most unruly of students ([REDACTED2]), and her oboe, when it sang, moved even the emperor of frogs who resided in the dark recesses of BL4. Her notes website brought salvation to hundreds of her underclassmen who worshiped her as their god. And her silence, well, it was an honour to be privy to it.

As [REDACTED] gracefully glided through the rampaging hordes of year 7s, heads turned as students and teachers alike gazed upon her beauty. However, one misstep from [REDACTED2] was all it took to send both of them sprawling onto the carpet. Rubbing his concussed head, [REDACTED2] opened his eyes, gazing upon the most beautiful girl he had ever seen. Long jet-black hair framed her porcelain-pale face, as confusion flashed across her warm almond shaped eyes. [REDACTED2], in that instant, was hit by a wave of emotions, "Is it possible for a girl to be this beautiful?" he thought to himself, as a blush spread across his face.

“Hey! Stop staring, its creepy.” [REDACTED] berated, a light rosy blush on her cheeks. Snapping out of his delusions, [REDACTED2] intelligently uttered, ‘uh… sorry?’ as he shakily stood up only to trip over a strategically misplaced schoolbag and tumble back onto the ground, pinning [REDACTED] under his bulky frame. Letting out a girly shriek, [REDACTED] stared up at the woefully mediocre looks of the [REDACTED2]. “He’s kinda cute…” She thought to herself before rationality kicked in. “Get off me!” She shrieked, attributing her previous thoughts about [REDACTED2] to her concussion, “Eww, pervert, disgusting!” Unfortunately for [REDACTED2], his room temperature IQ failed to comprehend the current situation, leaving him unconscious right outside the dungeon known as BL4.
